description: There are several cancellations on TfL Rail evening of Thursday 1 March 2018

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Please check before you travel for the latest information on how the adverse weather conditions will affect your journey."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
Due to a fault in Gidea Park Depot, some TfL Rail services this evening will be cancelled. We are working hard to run more services if we can and are sorry for the inconvenience this will cause.

1824 - Liverpool Street to Gidea Park
1832 - Liverpool Street to Gidea Park
1847 - Liverpool Street to Shenfield
2040 - Liverpool Street to Shenfield
2235 - Liverpool Street to Shenfield
0032 - Liverpool Street to Shenfield

1812 - Gidea Park to Liverpool Street
1944 - Shenfield to Liverpool Street
2134 - Shenfield to Liverpool Street
2329 - Shenfield to Liverpool Street
Last trains are unaffected in both directions and all other services will be running a normal timetable.
